properties.description: Link service for COVID reporting storage account.
Linked service for COVID reporting data lake storage gen2.
ECDC data for COVID19 in the EU.
Trigger starts once population gz file is uploaded into storage account.

scriptLines: CleanCountryFields split(equalsIgnoreCase(indicator, "Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k") || equalsIgnoreCase(indicator, "Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k"),
pivotBy(indicator, ['Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k', 'Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k']),
